articles.title: George Michael's sister left mere fraction of inherited fortune behind after tragic death - Express
articles.description: George Michael's sister left a mere £6.2 million behind when she died exactly three years after the tragic Wham star, despite inheriting a large portion of his vast £98million fortune.

articles.description: The star's smash hit single As It Was tops the year-end charts on Apple Music, Spotify and Deezer.
